price: 44. Yi-babbaw sheytan amri moggolin! Numtinwwellitte taqbudeemil, Diggah sheytan Racmaan kinni Rabbih amri cineeh kay qibaadal kaxxamariinite num yekkek.
arabic: يَٰٓأَبَتِ لَا تَعۡبُدِ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنَۖ إِنَّ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنَ كَانَ لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ عَصِيّٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: yāabati lā taʿbudi al-shayṭāna inna al-shayṭāna kāna lilrraḥmāni ʿaṣiyyan
